subtitle1: Team members are from sillicon valley and wall street. Attracted more than 10 million usd crypto Investment Fund, we are actively looking into investing in crypto space.

roadMapSubDesc1: A group of crypto ethusiasts and blockchain experts decided to setup the lab to contribute their rest of life into cryptoverse.
roadMapSubDesc2: World class crypto exchange has been launched under 6 months, we know this is a competitve world however we have confidence we can survive and grow in this space.
roadMapSubDesc3: This is our key point to compete with other exchanges by providing NFT exchangable services.

joinSerwrap: Perpetual Lab is built by a team of crypto and blockchain experts in the industry including phd researchers from Melbourne University, Deakin University etc. Experienced blockchain developers who worked for Accenture, eBay, Alibaba, Google and Huawei etc. Expierenced finacial crypto analyst who used to work for wall street crypto fund. We are a team of passionate, displine and expierenced cryto experts.
whyJoinUsDesc: Our employees are our most important asset and taking care of them has always been our top priority. Other than the competitive pay we offer, all of our full time permanent employees enjoy group health benefits that covers dental, vision and the prescription. In addition to that we host monthly team building events as well as employee birthday celebrations.
joinUsNow: If you have the same mindset, please don’t hesitate to contact us!
otcTitle: Australian Bitcoin and crypto OTC trading desk
otcSubtitle: Australia's premier OTC service for SMSFs, institutional clients and sophisticated high net worth investors.
otcInfoDesc1: Trade crypto in AUD, USD, NZD and SGD discreetly, securely and quickly. Trades typically settled on the same day.
otcInfoDesc2: Whether you’re looking to trade $100,000 or $10 million, we can execute the order though our deep local and global networks.
otcInfoDesc3: The OTC desk is located in Melboune. We operate Monday to Friday, 9am-5pm Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST).
otcInfoDesc4: Our OTC team is comprised of veteran traders. You will have exclusive access to our experts every step of the way, from account creation through to trade settlement and post trade insights.
otcInfoDesc5: We provide end-to-end service right from the initial expert consultation all the way to trade execution and same day settlement. We work with our clients to answer any questions to build comfort and trust.
otcInfoDesc6: We offer OTC desk support for all digital assets listed on exchanges including Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP (Ripple), BCH, EOS and more. Our Clients can buy in AUD, USD, NZD and SGD.
otcPromoDesc1: Fee free-deposits available. Trading fees from 0.5% down to 0.02%
otcPromoDesc2: Voted Australia’s Best Digital Currency Exchange
otcBeneDesc1: One key advantage of using a crypto/Bitcoin OTC service such as Independent Reserve is that market slippage is kept to a minimum. This means the gap between the cheapest price and the actual price for the volume you want to trade is minimized. The larger the trade size, the more you will save on slippage costs when executing via OTC.
otcBeneDesc2: Since OTC orders are not visible or reported to the market, there is less chance your trade will signal the market and move prices away from you before you are filled.
otcBeneDesc3: Whilst all trades are confidential, professional brokers can provide reporting and market color, which institutional traders often find valuable when making trading decisions. It is important to note that Independent Reserve does not provide financial advice. All readers and clients are strongly encouraged to conduct their own personal research.
otcBeneDesc4: OTC desks provide access to deep pools of liquidity by tapping into their networks of institutional crypto buyers and sellers, such as miners, ICO advisories, family offices, and investment funds.
